dt.t: … refers to himself as a "red-necked, tobacco-chewing {wi}Bubba{/wi}," although he quit chewing four years ago.

For those who find summer art festivals and wine tastings too highbrow, … a bunch of {wi}Bubbas{/wi} are putting on a festival that will hit the bull's-eye this weekend. The Summer Redneck Games kick off Saturday in Dublin, Ga., with the lighting of a ceremonial flame in a barbecue pit.

et: from {it}Bubba{/it}, a stereotypical nickname of Southern white males
